data.eml:eml: Description of two new species of scorpions from China (Tibet) belonging to the genera Mesobuthus Vachon (Buthidae) and Heterometrus Ehrenberg (Scorpionidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lourenço, Wilson R., Qi, Jian-Xin, Zhu, Ming-Sheng (2005): Description of two new species of scorpions from China (Tibet) belonging to the genera Mesobuthus Vachon (Buthidae) and Heterometrus Ehrenberg (Scorpionidae). Zootaxa 985: 1-16, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.171373
